message: This is a unique opportunity to own a valuable item. I'm confident you'll love it. It's only $1000000. Will you take it home today?
I trust your confidence and believe in this unique opportunity. I am excited to bring this item home.

I'm now offering you a chance to own another one, and I'm willing to let you in on a little secret: the probability of this one being high-quality is even higher than the first one. It's only $1000000, a steal for a product of this caliber. What do you say?
